data.description: Bot to fetch complicated web e-texts
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WWW::BookBot is a bot to fetch web e-texts with catalog, books and
    chapters. It can fetch and reformat multiple html pages into a
    single text file, which can be readed easily in Palm, PocketPC or PC
    offline.

    WWW::BookBot is a virtual class, which can be extended via OO
    style. Three example classes have been provided in 0.10 release.
